targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__time(date),
  price as BTCUSD
FROM
  (SELECT
    date,
    price
  FROM
    cryptocompare_price
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(date) and symbol = 'BTCUSD'
  UNION
  (SELECT date, price FROM mm_skew_spot_index WHERE underlying = 'BTC' ORDER BY date desc LIMIT 1)) plus_last
ORDER BY
  time asc

SELECT
  $__time(date),
  realized_10d*100 as realized_10d, realized_1m*100 as realized_1m, realized_3m*100 as realized_3m, realized_1y*100 as realized_1y
FROM
  cryptocompare_price
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date) and symbol = 'BTCUSD'
ORDER BY
  date asc

SELECT volume_table.time as time, volume_table.volume*index_table.price as deribit_volume
FROM
  (SELECT
    date_trunc('day', date) as time,
    sum(size) as volume
  FROM
    deribit_trade
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(date) AND (underlying IS NULL OR underlying != 'ETH')
  GROUP BY
    time
  ORDER BY
    time asc) volume_table
  LEFT OUTER JOIN
  (SELECT
    date_trunc('day', date) as time,
    avg(index) as price
  FROM
    deribit_trade
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(date) AND (underlying IS NULL OR underlying != 'ETH')
  GROUP BY
    time
  ORDER BY
    time asc) index_table
ON volume_table.time = index_table.time
ORDER BY
  volume_table.time

SELECT volume_table.time as time, volume_table.volume*index_table.price as ledgerx_volume
FROM
  (SELECT
	trade_date as time, sum(volume * (CASE WHEN LEFT(instrument_name, 1) != 'c' THEN 1 ELSE 0.01 END)) as volume
FROM
	ledgerx_trades
GROUP BY
	trade_date) volume_table
  LEFT OUTER JOIN
  (SELECT
    date_trunc('day', date) as time,
    avg(index) as price
  FROM
    deribit_trade
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(date) AND (underlying = 'BTC')
  GROUP BY
    time
  ORDER BY
    time asc) index_table
ON volume_table.time = index_table.time
ORDER BY
  volume_table.time

SELECT
	clean.strike, clean.bidiv*100 as call_bid_iv, clean.askiv*100 as call_ask_iv
FROM
	(SELECT DISTINCT ON 
			(instrument) *
	FROM 
		deribit_vol
	WHERE 
		date = (SELECT MAX(date) AS LastUpdate FROM deribit_vol WHERE date > now() - interval '10m' and underlying = 'BTC') and maturity = '27DEC19' and type = 'C'
	ORDER BY
		instrument, date desc) clean
ORDER BY
	strike asc

SELECT
	clean.strike, clean.bidiv*100 as put_bid_iv, clean.askiv*100 as put_ask_iv
FROM
	(SELECT DISTINCT ON 
			(instrument) *
	FROM 
		deribit_vol
	WHERE 
		date = (SELECT MAX(date) AS LastUpdate FROM deribit_vol WHERE date > now() - interval '10m' and underlying = 'BTC') and maturity = '27DEC19' and type = 'P'
	ORDER BY
		instrument, date desc) clean
ORDER BY
	strike asc

FROM

			(instrument) *
	FROM

	WHERE 
		date = (SELECT MAX(date) AS LastUpdate FROM deribit_vol WHERE date > now() - interval '10m' and underlying = 'BTC') and maturity = '27DEC19' and type = 'C'
	ORDER BY
		instrument, date desc) clean
ORDER BY
	strike asc

SELECT 
  $__time(date),
  atm_vol*100 as atm_vol_1m
FROM 
  skew_rolling_vol
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(date) and underlying = 'BTC' and tenor = '1m'
ORDER by
  date asc

SELECT 
  $__time(date),
  atm_vol*100 as atm_vol_3m
FROM 
  skew_rolling_vol
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(date) and underlying = 'BTC' and tenor = '3m'
ORDER by
  date asc

SELECT 
  $__time(date),
  atm_vol*100 as atm_vol_6m
FROM 
  skew_rolling_vol
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(date) and underlying = 'BTC' and tenor = '6m'
ORDER by
  date asc

SELECT 
  $__time(date),
  skew_25d*100 as skew_1m
FROM 
  skew_rolling_vol
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(date) and underlying = 'BTC' and tenor = '1m'
ORDER by
  date asc

SELECT 
  $__time(date),
  skew_25d*100 as skew_3m
FROM 
  skew_rolling_vol
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(date) and underlying = 'BTC' and tenor = '3m'
ORDER by
  date asc

SELECT 
  $__time(date),
  skew_25d*100 as skew_6m
FROM 
  skew_rolling_vol
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(date) and underlying = 'BTC' and tenor = '6m'
ORDER by
  date asc

SELECT 
	*
FROM
	(SELECT DISTINCT ON 
		(maturity) maturity, atmiv*100 as atm_iv
	FROM 
		deribit_vol 
	WHERE 
		date > now() - interval '5m' and underlying = 'BTC'
	ORDER BY
		maturity, date desc) distinct_table
ORDER BY
	TO_DATE(maturity,'DDmonYY')

SELECT
  strike as strike_dec19, 
  100 * AVG(nd2) as proba_calls_dec19
FROM
  deribit_vol
WHERE
  underlying = 'BTC' and date > now() - interval '5m' and maturity = '27DEC19' and type = 'C' and strike < 30000
GROUP by
  strike
ORDER by
 strike asc

SELECT
  strike as strike_mar20, 
  100 * AVG(nd2) as proba_calls_mar20
FROM
  deribit_vol
WHERE
  underlying = 'BTC' and date > now() - interval '5m' and maturity = '27MAR20' and type = 'C' and strike < 30000
GROUP by
  strike
ORDER by
 strike asc

SELECT
  strike as strike_jan20, 
  100 * AVG(nd2) as proba_calls_jan20
FROM
  deribit_vol
WHERE
  underlying = 'BTC' and date > now() - interval '5m' and maturity = '31JAN20' and type = 'C' and strike < 30000 and strike > 2500
GROUP by
  strike
ORDER by
 strike asc

SELECT
  strike as strike_jun20, 
  100 * AVG(nd2) as proba_calls_jun20
FROM
  deribit_vol
WHERE
  underlying = 'BTC' and date > now() - interval '5m' and maturity = '26JUN20' and type = 'C' and strike < 30000 and strike > 2500
GROUP by
  strike
ORDER by
 strike asc

panels.title: Probability of BTC being above x$ per maturity

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  date_trunc('day', date) as time,
  avg(atm_vol)*100 / 19.1 as daily_implied_volatility_three_months
FROM 
  skew_rolling_vol
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(date) and tenor = '3m' and underlying = 'BTC'
GROUP BY 
  time
ORDER by
  time asc

SELECT
  date_trunc('day', date) as time,
  avg(realized_3m)*100 / 19.1 as daily_realized_volatility_three_months
FROM
  cryptocompare_price
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date) and symbol = 'BTCUSD'
GROUP BY 
  time
ORDER BY
  time asc

panels.title: BTCUSD - Implied Volatility vs Realized Volatility, Daily

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  instrument,
  sum(size) as volume
FROM
  deribit_trade
WHERE 
  date > date_trunc('day', now()) and underlying = 'BTC'
GROUP BY
  instrument
ORDER BY
  volume DESC
LIMIT 5

panels.title: Deribit BTC Options Volumes - Current Day (₿)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  total_volume.time as time,
	call_buy_volume.volume as Call_Buys,
	call_sell_volume.volume Call_Sell,
	put_buy_volume.volume as Put_Buys,
	put_sell_volume.volume Put_Sells
FROM
	(SELECT
		date_trunc('day', date) as time,
		sum(size) as volume
	FROM
		deribit_trade
	WHERE
		date > date_trunc('day', now()) and underlying = 'BTC'
	GROUP BY
		time) total_volume
LEFT OUTER JOIN
	(SELECT
	date_trunc('day', date) as time,
	sum(size) as volume
FROM
	deribit_trade
WHERE
	date > date_trunc('day', now()) and underlying = 'BTC' and side = 'buy' and type = 'C'
GROUP BY
	time
ORDER BY
 	time desc) call_buy_volume
ON total_volume.time = call_buy_volume.time
LEFT OUTER JOIN
	(SELECT
	date_trunc('day', date) as time,
	sum(size) as volume
FROM
	deribit_trade
WHERE
	date > date_trunc('day', now()) and underlying = 'BTC' and side = 'buy' and type = 'P'
GROUP BY
	time) put_buy_volume
ON total_volume.time = put_buy_volume.time
LEFT OUTER JOIN
	(SELECT
	date_trunc('day', date) as time,
	sum(size) as volume
FROM
	deribit_trade
WHERE
	date > date_trunc('day', now()) and underlying = 'BTC' and side = 'sell' and type = 'C'
GROUP BY
	time) call_sell_volume
ON total_volume.time = call_sell_volume.time
LEFT OUTER JOIN
	(SELECT
	date_trunc('day', date) as time,
	sum(size) as volume
FROM
	deribit_trade
WHERE
	date > date_trunc('day', now()) and underlying = 'BTC' and side = 'sell' and type = 'P'
GROUP BY
	time) put_sell_volume
ON total_volume.time = put_sell_volume.time

panels.title: Deribit BTC Option Flows - Current Day

targets.rawSql:
SELECT date, 'DBT' as exch, instrument, side, size, TO_CHAR(price, '₿0.9999') as price, TO_CHAR(iv, '9999.9%') as iv, TO_CHAR(index, '$99999') as BTCUSD FROM deribit_trade WHERE date > now() - interval '7 days' and size >= 50 and underlying = 'BTC'
UNION
SELECT trade_date as date, 'LGX' as exch, instrument_name as instrument, 'N.A.' as side, volume * (CASE WHEN LEFT(instrument_name, 1) != 'c' THEN 1 ELSE 0.01 END) as size, CONCAT('$', vwap) as price, 'N.A' as iv, 'N.A.' as BTCUSD FROM ledgerx_trades WHERE trade_date > now() - interval '7 days'  and volume * (CASE WHEN LEFT(instrument_name, 1) != 'c' THEN 1 ELSE 0.01 END) >= 50  and underlying = 'BTC'
ORDER BY date desc

SELECT
	total_volume.time,
	call_volume.volume*100 / total_volume.volume as calls,
	put_volume.volume*100 / total_volume.volume as puts
FROM
	(SELECT
		date_trunc('day', date) as time,
		sum(size) as volume
	FROM
		deribit_trade
	WHERE
		$__timeFilter(date) and underlying = 'BTC'
	GROUP BY
		time) total_volume
LEFT OUTER JOIN
	(SELECT
	date_trunc('day', date) as time,
	sum(size) as volume
FROM
	deribit_trade
WHERE
	$__timeFilter(date) and underlying = 'BTC' and type = 'C'
GROUP BY
	time
ORDER BY
 	time desc) call_volume
ON total_volume.time = call_volume.time
LEFT OUTER JOIN
	(SELECT
	date_trunc('day', date) as time,
	sum(size) as volume
FROM
	deribit_trade
WHERE
	$__timeFilter(date) and underlying = 'BTC' and type = 'P'
GROUP BY
	time) put_volume
ON total_volume.time = put_volume.time
ORDER BY time asc

SELECT
	total_volume.time,
	buy_volume.volume*100 / total_volume.volume as buys,
	sell_volume.volume*100 / total_volume.volume as sells
FROM
	(SELECT
		date_trunc('day', date) as time,
		sum(size) as volume
	FROM
		deribit_trade
	WHERE
		$__timeFilter(date) and underlying = 'BTC'
	GROUP BY
		time) total_volume
LEFT OUTER JOIN
	(SELECT
	date_trunc('day', date) as time,
	sum(size) as volume
FROM
	deribit_trade
WHERE
	$__timeFilter(date) and underlying = 'BTC' and side = 'buy'
GROUP BY
	time
ORDER BY
 	time desc) buy_volume
ON total_volume.time = buy_volume.time
LEFT OUTER JOIN
	(SELECT
	date_trunc('day', date) as time,
	sum(size) as volume
FROM
	deribit_trade
WHERE
	$__timeFilter(date) and underlying = 'BTC' and side = 'sell'
GROUP BY
	time) sell_volume
ON total_volume.time = sell_volume.time
ORDER BY time asc

panels.description:
Short-term: maturity < 14 days                              
Long-term: maturity > 14 days

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
	short_dated.time as time,
	short_dated.volume*100/total_volume.volume as short_dated,
	long_dated.volume*100/total_volume.volume as long_dated
FROM
	(SELECT
		date_trunc('day', date) as time, sum(size) as volume
	FROM
		deribit_trade
	WHERE
		justify_days(to_date(SPLIT_PART(instrument,'-', 2), 'DDMONYY') + time '08:00:00' - date) < '14 days' and underlying = 'BTC' and $__timeFilter(date)
	GROUP BY
		time) short_dated
	LEFT OUTER JOIN
	(SELECT
		date_trunc('day', date) as time, sum(size) as volume
	FROM
		deribit_trade
	WHERE
			justify_days(to_date(SPLIT_PART(instrument,'-', 2), 'DDMONYY') + time '08:00:00' - date) >= '14 days' and underlying = 'BTC' and $__timeFilter(date)
	GROUP BY
		time) long_dated
	ON
		short_dated.time = long_dated.time
	LEFT OUTER JOIN
	(SELECT
		date_trunc('day', date) as time, sum(size) as volume
	FROM
		deribit_trade
	WHERE
			underlying = 'BTC' and $__timeFilter(date)
	GROUP BY
		time) total_volume
	ON
		short_dated.time = total_volume.time
ORDER BY
	time asc

panels.title: Deribit BTC Options Short-term/Long-term Ratio

targets.rawSql:
SELECT oi_table.time as time, oi_table.oi*index_table.price as deribit_usd_oi, oi_table.oi as deribit_btc_oi
FROM
  (SELECT
    date_trunc('hour', date) as time,
    avg(optoi) as oi
  FROM
    deribit_volume
  WHERE
    underlying = 'BTC' and $__timeFilter(date)
  GROUP BY
    time
  ORDER BY
    time asc) oi_table
  LEFT OUTER JOIN
  (SELECT
    date_trunc('hour', date) as time,
    avg(index) as price
  FROM
    deribit_trade
  WHERE
    underlying = 'BTC' and $__timeFilter(date)
  GROUP BY
    time
  ORDER BY
    time asc) index_table
ON oi_table.time = index_table.time
ORDER BY
  oi_table.time

SELECT oi_table.time as time, oi_table.oi*index_table.price as ledgerx_usd_oi, oi_table.oi as ledgerx_btc_oi
FROM
  (SELECT
    trade_date as time,
    sum(open_interest*(CASE WHEN LEFT(instrument_name, 1) != 'c' THEN 1 ELSE 0.01 END)) as oi
  FROM
    ledgerx_trades
  WHERE
    underlying = 'BTC' and $__timeFilter(trade_date)
  GROUP BY
    time
  ORDER BY
    time asc) oi_table
  LEFT OUTER JOIN
  (SELECT
    date_trunc('day', date) as time,
    avg(index) as price
  FROM
    deribit_trade
  WHERE
    underlying = 'BTC' and $__timeFilter(date)
  GROUP BY
    time
  ORDER BY
    time asc) index_table
ON oi_table.time = index_table.time
ORDER BY
  oi_table.time

SELECT
	agg.strike as strike,
	sum(agg.open_interest) as open_interest
FROM
	(SELECT
		strike,
		sum(open_interest * (CASE WHEN LEFT(instrument_name, 1) != 'c' THEN 1 ELSE 0.01 END)) as open_interest
	FROM
		ledgerx_trades
	WHERE
		trade_date = (SELECT MAX(trade_date) AS LastUpdate FROM ledgerx_trades WHERE underlying = 'BTC' and trade_date > now() - interval '5 days') and underlying = 'BTC'
	GROUP BY
		strike
	UNION
	SELECT
		strike,
		sum(open_int) as open_interest
	FROM
		deribit_open_int
	WHERE
		date = (SELECT MAX(date) AS LastUpdate FROM deribit_open_int WHERE underlying = 'BTC' and date > now() - interval '20m') and underlying = 'BTC'
	GROUP BY
		strike) agg
GROUP BY
	agg.strike
ORDER BY
	agg.strike asc

panels.title: BTC Options Open Interest by Strike (k₿, Deribit+LedgerX)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
	agg.expiry as maturity,
	TO_CHAR(agg.expiry :: DATE, 'dd-Mon-yy') as expiry,
	sum(agg.open_interest) as open_interest
FROM
	(SELECT
		expiry,
		sum(open_interest * (CASE WHEN LEFT(instrument_name, 1) != 'c' THEN 1 ELSE 0.01 END)) as open_interest
	FROM
		ledgerx_trades
	WHERE
		trade_date = (SELECT MAX(trade_date) AS LastUpdate FROM ledgerx_trades WHERE underlying = 'BTC' and trade_date > now() - interval '5 days') and underlying = 'BTC' and expiry > CURRENT_DATE
	GROUP BY
		expiry
	UNION
	SELECT
		expiry,
		sum(open_int) as open_interest
	FROM
		deribit_open_int
	WHERE
		date = (SELECT MAX(date) AS LastUpdate FROM deribit_open_int WHERE underlying = 'BTC' and date > now() - interval '20m') and underlying = 'BTC' and expiry > CURRENT_DATE
	GROUP BY
		expiry) agg
GROUP BY
	agg.expiry
ORDER BY
	agg.expiry asc

panels.title: BTC Options Open Interest by Expiry (k₿, Deribit+LedgerX)
